skillTree.localised_description: A true Lord knows the Underway, his Dwarfhold and how to fight under the ground better than anyone.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This stubborn Dwarf refuses to yield or tire, and ensures his followers are of the same ilk.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -15%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "We have taken the Slayer’s Oath and would pit our axes against those beasts. If we come back, have all your ale ready. If, instead, it is our time to take the Path of Grimnir, then may our doom be a mighty one. If we do not return, remember us to our clans and kings."

effects.description: Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: Daemon Slayer, a warrior who has managed to survive the encounter with one of the most ferocious creatures to ever live, slaying it and surviving to tell the tale.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +20

skillTree.localised_description: Daemon Slayers seek out the most horrifying foes, those in servitude to the Ruinous Powers.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Daemons

skillTree.localised_description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? This angst-ridden fighter surely doesn't, but now he must seek out and battle ever more ferocious enemies.

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Some Slayers, despite their best efforts to find and fight the most formidable of foes, still fail at their task of dying in battle. By dint of constant fighting, these rare Slayers become ever more scar-riddled and dangerous.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +7
Charge bonus: +15

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

effects.description: Melee defence: +6
Melee defence: +12

skillTree.localised_description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

effects.description: Hit points: +7%
Hit points: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Slayers seeks nothing more in life than an honorable and glorious death that shall expunge the shame that has pushed him upon this path, and to be remembered in the saga's of his people for all time.

effects.description: Enables magical attacks
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +25
Enables magical attacks
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +50

skillTree.localised_description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

effects.description: Ability: "Foe-Seeker"

skillTree.localised_description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10%
Weapon strength: +20%

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

effects.description: Melee attack: +6
Melee attack: +12

skillTree.localised_description: While Dwarfs are generally not the most nimble inhabitants of the Old World, they can move surprisingly fast when not slowed by heavy armour.

effects.description: Physical resistance: 7%
Physical resistance: 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

effects.description: Speed: +7%
Speed: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

effects.description: Ability: "Deadly Onslaught"
Passive ability: "Deathblow"

skillTree.localised_description: A Experienced Slayer is often joined on his journeys by a swarm of younger brethren from the Slayer cult.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -15% for embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Daemon Slayer, embedded Dragon Slayer Heroes and Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Some Slayers, despite their best efforts to find and fight the most formidable of foes, still fail at their task of dying in battle. By dint of constant fighting, these rare Slayers become ever more scar-riddled and dangerous.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Great warriors and doomseekers who have unsuccessfully found death thus far..."

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +5 for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15% for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Slayer units

Charge bonus: +30% for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Younger Slayers flock towards such renowned killers as Daemon Slayers, as they can be assured that, as he seeks his ultimate destiny, he will lead them straight towards foes against whom a worthy end might be made.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Rage" for Slayer units,
	upgrades to "Berserk" at (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text: When this unit gets hurt it may go on a rampage against nearby enemy units, attacking the closest one and ignoring any orders given.

effects.description: Speed: +12% for Slayer units

Passive ability: "Journey's End" for Slayer units
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such is the might of this being that followers and foes alike will shrink back or cower in his intimidating presence.

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -5
	(local region)

skillTree.localised_description: Dark, corrupting, evil forces have no place here!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +10 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: No servant of the Midnight Aristocracy dares stand against the veteran Slayer.

Bonus vs. Large: +10 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Urks, like all slimy fungus, must be wiped from the boot whenever trodden upon.

effects.description:
Passive ability: "Frenzy" when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Such high-minded ways and pure ideals count for nothing when you’re wormfood.

Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +25% when fighting against Elves
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Skaven are a disease, a cancer on this world… You are a plague and we are the cure…"

skillTree.localised_description: Having a plan isn't always enough; sometimes you need insight, sometimes foresight, but always martial strength.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.localised_description: This Dwarf spent time in the pits, gaining a Miner's intuition of the dangers and prey to be found in the dark.

skillTree.localised_description: "I have seen better lavatory walls than this - I'll have it down by the morrow, that's a pledge!"

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Daemon Slayers are committed to die gloriously fighting monsters, not to leading others or looking after newcomers.

effects.description: A moderate chance that additional slayers will be added to the Regiments of Renown pool after winning battles
Daemon SlayerLord can only recruit units from the Regiments of Renown pool
Gains unique traits after defeating certain monsters
